description: When you try to launch an ami image using the xen driver, the launch fails with a kernel panic.  I've investigated and found that this is due to a typo in vmops.py.  Patch to follow.
title: Kernel Panic when start instance in Xen Environment

comments.content: When you try to launch an ami image using the xen driver, the launch fails with a kernel panic.  I've investigated and found that this is due to a typo in vmops.py.  Patch to follow.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sleepsonthefloor
